content: inspired by the much loved pretty maids all in a row shawl here i now have a scarf version available i ve written this pattern in uk terms with us terms written alongside in brackets there is also a simplified chart pattern at the end for this pattern you will need any 4 ply yarn i have used a scheepjes whirl in scrumptious lush you will also need a 3mm crochet hook scissors and a sewing needle i would highly recommend blocking your scarf once finished it will help bring out the design when finished my scarf measured 70 inches 178 cm by 14 inches 36 cm this sale is for the pattern only this pattern is downloaded as a pdf you will receive a digital download after the purchase of the pattern any problems please message me at suzy@daisyboo net
